channel.title: Got a free Cb 130 acc, but need to recover it. rep++
channel.description:
Hey guys, ive got a friend who buyed an account a while ago an cb 130+ acc.
but the owner recovered his account back. Now hes creazy as fuck and said im quiting this shit, so he gave me all the account information.
So i got like all the older passwords, The e-mail aderesses, the time the acc is created, i got all information exept the password,
but when i try to get password back it sends e-mail to his e-mail, and if i try to change e-mail i need a password.
so anybody knows how i can get this acc? because i do have all the recovery questions and passwords and information and stuff.
repp+

item.title: Got a free Cb 130 acc, but need to recover it. rep++
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:7, topic:440755”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=543427.msg3983146#msg3983146 date=1335542107]
type in your own email instead of his, and then use the recovery info.
[/quote]

Then it says, invailid E-mail[/quote]

holy shit you’re retarded

edit: lol i bumped a dead topic

Read full topic

item.title: Got a free Cb 130 acc, but need to recover it. rep++
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

The bad side about buying an account is that if the original owner recovers it, you’re basically screwed. The original owner only has to post that he was hacked in a thread on the orsf and all the information your friend had on the account(passwords he used, recoveries, IPs, etc) become useless whilst recovering.

Read full topic
